godakma godak kalekata passe nawathath kodukaraya blog karaliyata paminila.me masa ganak eka digatama yedila thibuna wadath ekka blog eka paththata enna nolabuna ekata siyalloma samawenna oone.dan ithin ahayi me podi ewuwanta mona wadada kiyala.pahugiya dawas tike yedila thibuna wishalama wade thamayi upul shantha sannasgala nam guruwarayage panthiya wisin sanwidhanaya karapu maha kala ulela.ee gana wisthara menna methanin balaganna puluwan.thawa me ahinsaka kodukaraya kamarakaranayen saha widiyo sanskaranayen sahabhagi wu athulanthaya nam keti chithrapataya.ithin me siyalu wada hethuwen thamayi mata kodukarayagra adawiya paththata enna bariwune.onna ithin nilambaara wasanthaye milanga kotasath ekka ada mama kodukarayage adawiyata awilla thiyanawa.
eeta passe sithawaka rajasinha thamanta udarata allanna udaw karapu wirasundara bandarawa boru walaka dala mara damimath ekka eyage putha konappu bandara pruthugisin gawata panala yanawa.

edineda katayuthu waladi apa widuliya upayogi karaganimin pawichchi karana upakarana samuhayak atha mewata uwarana kiyada hadunwayi mema uwarana widuli uwarana saha ilektronika uwarana lesa nawatha warga kala haka enamuth mema uwarana dewargaya athara athi wenasa theruma ganima bohowita pahasu nowe mema uwarana dewargaya sadahama widyuthaya upayogi karaganima eeta hethuwayi mema dewargaye wenasa saralawa apa wimasa balamu ilektronika widyawa widyuthayen wihidi giya shethrayaki widyuthaya widya wishaya kshethrayak lesa awurudu 200 k tharam paraniya aleksandar wolata wisin nipadawu mulma widuli koshaya dhara widyuthaye mularambaya lesa hadinwiya haka eda meda thura nipadawu wiwidha widyuthupakarana nisa apage jiwana mattma wada hoda thathwayakata pathwa atha motar,dayinamo,widuli panka mese apata nithara muna gasena widuli uwarana kihipayaki mema uwarana walin kerenuye widyuth shakthi wenatha shakthin bawata path kara wada karaganimayi mehidi wenne widuli paripatha thulin gamana karana ilektrona sathu chalaka shakthiya wenath shakthi prabeda bawata path karalimaya mehidi apa proyojanaya ganne ese pariwarthanayakara laba ganna shakthiyayi apata edineda jiwithayedi munagasena ilektronik uwarana kipayak pilibada wimasa balamu rediyowa rupawahiniya parighanakaya ewani uwarana kipayaki esema ema uwarana thulada yam aakarayakata shakthiya pariwarthana pramanayak sidu weyi enamuth mema uwarana magin pradana washayen kerenuye ilektronik dhara palanaya karaganimen ha hasuruwa ganimen wiwidha andame widyuth sangnya nipadhawa ganimayi mema sangnya udawkaraganimen wiwidha sewa sidukaraganu labayi memagin apa labaganna sewaya wanne kisiyam sanniwedanayak ho danumaki me wannak widuli uwaranayakin sidu noweyi eya widyuth uwaranawala siduwana andame hudek shakthi pariwarthanayakma nowe pahatha rupayen dakwa aththe ilektrona uwarana magin ese nipadawa ganna wiwidha widyuth sangnya kipayaka swarupaya dakagatha hakiya esema ilektronika uwarana sadaha pamanak yodaganna wishesha upanga samuhayak da atha transistaraya ,diyodaya, sangruhitha paripatha ,kapata nala(walwa) mema kotasata ayathya kapata nala mekala bahulawa yoda noganna wu mul yugaye bhawitha kala ilektronik upangayaki apata edineda jiwithayedi muna gasena samahara uwaranawala mema widyuth saha ilektronika yana kotas dekama thibimata puluwana udaharanayak lesa jaya pitapath yanthrayakata yodana kadadasi ema yanthraya thulin gaman karawimata ehi adangu kuda motar warga hethukaraka we motar widuli upakarana wisheshayak we enamuth eyata yodana kadadasiwala thathwaya warnakaye ho thinthawala thathwaya athulu wiwidha sadhaka pilibadha sanniwedanaya apata labadenne ehi adangu wiwidha ilektronika paripatha magini mese nuthana boho upakarana thula widyuth saha ilektronika yana kotas dewargayama adangu wiya haka ilektronik upanga kipayak hadunaganna
